Posts.Content:
I did not know ,that the Chronic pain. In my jaw, upper torso and face could possibly be...MS....and I asked my Dr about
 the test...he said Spinal tap...that was it!!!but I did get him to test me for Lymexample disease, Ebstien bar an other stuff having to do with my thyroid!!! gives me the paper diet every month....ðŸ˜’his PA does this too!!! This is really nice for what really a Iles me.......I KNOW MY OWN BODY! SO WHYYY DONT THEY LISTEN? He won't even refer me to speacialist!!! I'm assessing my own health...writingQ&A is this a good thing or not?
Posts.Title: Wife diagnosed with BC...im scared, shes scared.

Posts.Content:
It's me again....I see these changes in my face....these muscle spasms are constantrying wearing me out! It's exhausting an I have had these not to mention
 My legs ,arms and hands for more than 8yrs....I was diagnosed with Fibro by a Dr in phx...I have degenerative spine and disc Disease Ihave lost 2iniches off of my Height. My nurse practitioner who came to my home for yearly exam"that's NOT GOOD THAT means ur spine is compressing....I asked my dr..for referral to get my MRI updated...I even brought him a copy of my MRI I had done in 2013 ..I was DENIED!!! BECAUSE PRIMARY GAVE NO INFO REGARDING THIS REQUEST.....
I'M SORRY EVERYONE JUST NERVOUS & SCARED TO DEATH!
